message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really love. Would you like to make an offer for the product?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you consider accepting $12000 for the product?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $12500 for the product. Could we meet at this price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13500?
